thread.title: Nach Baliye 8: Bharti Singh’s beau Haarsh Limbachiya has the moves – view pics!
thread.title_full: Nach Baliye 8: Bharti Singh’s beau Haarsh Limbachiya has the moves – view pics!

author: Urmimala Banerjee
title: Nach Baliye 8: Bharti Singh’s beau Haarsh Limbachiya has the moves – view pics!
text:
Anil Kapoor and Madhuri Dixit Nene sizzle on their hit songs: View Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 7 finale pics! 
Nach Baliye 8 is probably going to be the biggest celebrity reality show of the year. Couples like Divyanka Tripathi – Vivek Dahiya, Dipika Kakar- Shoaib Ibrahim , Mona Lisa – Vikrant Singh Rajpoot are a part of the season. Amongst them are comedian Bharti Singh and her writer beau, Haarsh Limbachiya. The lady had earlier said that Haarsh was a non-dancer and wasn’t keen to participate but now it seems that he is onboard with Bharti. It looks like they will make a cute couple. Star Plus has roped in the choreographer team of Savio, Danny and Kunjan for Bharti and him. They are the same time that worked with her in Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa. Bharti and Savio Barnes are great friends too. The trio will choreograph the steps for Bharti and Haarsh. The rehearsals have started in full swing and everyone is damn excited for the same. Bharti got nostalgic as she began work with Savio for the show. (Also Read: Bharti Singh CONFIRMS her wedding date says she is very excited) 

Talking about thier association, the comicial Queen Bharti Singh says, ” I am overwhelmed and super excited to get associated with DKS team. They are amazing and super talented. I always liked dancing but Savio has nurtured my dancing skills and every time encouraged me to do challenging steps. We had some beautiful memories together in the past and I am looking forward to make many more in my Nach Baliye journey with my partner.” Besides Nach Baliye, Bharti Singh will also be seen on Chote Miyan on Colors. (Also Read: Nach Baliye is back! This time with Kajol, Karan Singh Grover and these celeb couples – read details) 
Bharti Singh and Haarsh have been dating for eight years now. The lady clarified this recently. They are to be married this year in November or December. The lady said she wants to take things easy for a few months prior to the wedding to make all the arrangements. There were rumours that they got engaged in January but Bharti refuted those rumours. Nach Baliye will kickstart close to April on Star Plus and is keenly awaited for many reasons. From the star jodis to the hosts and the fact that BBC Worldwide is producing the show. Stay tuned to Bollywood Life for more scoop and updates…. 
Published:  34 pm Topics:
